en.title: Argentina's Videla regime initiated "National Reorganization Process."
NFL's Doug Flutie threw a "Hail Flutie" pass to beat Miami.
Benazir Bhutto elected Prime Minister of Pakistan.
Disney's "Toy Story" was released in theaters.
Mother Teresa received honorary U.S. citizenship.
Saudi Arabia's al-Qaeda branch bombed a residential compound in Riyadh.
The Dow Jones Industrial Average closed above 10,000 for the first time since October 2008.
Xi Jinping appointed General Secretary of the Communist Party of China.
NASA successfully tested its Low-Density Supersonic Decelerator (LDSD).
Predicted date of the next US Presidential Election.
